name: Stack island - Card puzzle survival
description:
It is a survival game played with cards. If you know Card Survival: Tropical Islands, you may be familiar with it.

Stack and combine various item cards to survive until you can escape the island. It's hard to survive if you don't hide in your shelter and fall asleep late at night and before the sun goes down. When the game starts, focus first on building a shelter so you can spend the first night.

This version is

The current installable version contains only part of the content, and the play time is not long.

How to play

* Complete the objectives displayed in the quest window one by one.

* Click the search card in your bag to search your current location and find a card.

* Each region can draw up to 7 cards in total. If you run out of space, you cannot discover new cards by clicking search cards.

* If you use a search card, the search value of the area increases, and the higher the value, the lower the probability of finding the card. Over time, the search number will decrease.

* When you find a direction card, you can click on it to move to another place.

* If you drag the cards to overlap, you can combine them to create a new card, if you cannot combine them, the cards will remain overlapping, and click again to separate them.

* You will die when your health is completely exhausted.

* The higher the contamination level, the faster the stamina consumption. In addition to food, you can increase your stamina by consuming other items when your stamina is low, but you must manage it carefully as the contamination level can increase as well.

* You can catch small creatures by touching them, but large creatures can run away or be attacked by touching them, so you must make and use hunting tools.

* If you die, you cannot resume the game.

Install

Simply download the zip, unpack all the files in zip to a folder, and launch StackIsland_tutorialTest.exe!
